attributes.action: Increase the 3 year sentence handed down for the killing of the Statham Family & remove Justice Irwin from his post.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Paulo Jorge Nogueira da Silva killed the Statham family, of Llandudno, when his 40-ton Daf lorry ploughed into their car and pushed it under a Volvo lorry near Sandbach, Cheshire, on October 20, 2008. 

David and Michelle Statham died instantly along with their sons Reece, 13, Jay, nine, and Mason, 20 months, and 10-week-old baby daughter Ellouise.

Da Silva, 46, of Murcia, in Spain, was convicted at Chester Crown Court of six counts of the lesser charge of causing death by careless driving.

Trial judge Mr Justice Irwin jailed him for three years on each count, to run concurrently, and told him he would serve 18 MONTHS in custody before being allowed out on licence.

Cheshire Police said Da Silva was USING A LAPTOP in the cab of his vehicle at the time of the crash, possibly to plan his route.

THE BRITISH JUSTICE SYSTEM NEEDS A COMPLETE OVERHAUL AND JUSTICE IRWIN (AND ANY JUDGE WHO HANDS OUT SUCH LENIENT SENTENCES) NEED TO BE REMOVED FROM THEIR POSTS IMMEDIATELY.  THE PEOPLE OF BRITAIN ARE DISGUSTED WITH THESE SO-CALLED "SENTENCES" THAT OFFER NO DETERRENT TO CRIME WHATSOEVER!

rejection.details: Individual sentences are a matter for the courts, who are independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
